data.title: Local favorite!
data.text:
We've been going to Kelly's Eastside for years.  Great food, great people and great entertainment! 
Good classic American fare.  They can't be beat!

data.title: Awesome Dinner
data.text:
We had never visited Kelly's Eastside and on our way to a show decided to give it a try. A great decision on our part.

We ordered drinks, the Crab, Artichoke and Spinach Baked Appetizer. We placed our dinner orders at the same time. An order we later thought was a mistake once we dug in to the appetizer and melted at the table. It was divine--a mouthwatering heavenly taste. We both nodded and then agreed that we should have skipped the entrees and had a second appetizer instead.

However, once our entree arrived it was also a pleasant surprise. The thinly sliced brisket didn't need chewing, it melted in the mouth. It was lean, the sauce was perfect and our decision to stop at Kelly's was the best we had made all year.

Highly recommended---with particular emphasis on the appetizer. A very memorable dinner experience.

data.title: Great local hangout for Aggies. Good burgers, fries, and chicken that goes really well with the Cold Beer on Tap.
data.text:
Great local hangout for Aggies. Good burgers, fries, and chicken that goes really well with the Cold Beer on Tap. parking can be a little trouble in downtown Plano, but still worth it.
We should go more often but there are just so many choices on where to eat in Plano.  Enjoy!

data.title: Pub Food and Brewskis
data.text: Great pub food and beverages in a café setting with inside and outside seating.  Burgers are good-big and juicy.  Texas weather is steamy so the outside seating is recommended in the Spring, Fall and evenings only.

data.title: Empty for a reason
data.text: A friend invited me for lunch there. She chose the place because of previous positive experiences. The menu included many different types of food from barbecue to Mexican tacos. I ordered a barbecue sandwich which was mediocre.

data.title: Fix your Burger crave
data.text:
The food is worth the oddness of the experience.  

Parking is work - there are several free options you just have to work at it.  There are free lots, a free parking garage and free street side parking.  The patio vibe is great - add to that the fun of old town Plano and it's a good experience. 

Not really sure where the front door is - or where the front of house is once you get inside.  Finding a clean table is usually an issue, but once you're settled its comfy and fun.  Restrooms are another maze experience but again your in old buildings so go with it.

Burgers are great - and beverages are always cold!  I have been for happy hour and they had complimentary chips, salsa and quesadillas which were awesome.   Can't go wrong!!

data.title: Trendy, but warm atmosphere.
data.text: A comfortable place where you can talk, getting more lively later in the evening.  Mostly good traditional pub food, with good sized portions.

data.title: Good eats
data.text: the food at Kelly's is always good ! the wait staff and owners leave a lot to be desired and have been known to be down right rude , but the food is always good -

data.title: hard to get in at times, hang out for the locals
data.text: I have tried a couple times to go but only been successful once.  Parking is not close, and locals hang out for hours just drinking so not a easy place to find seating at times.  Food was ok - good.  Wait staff was hit or miss but more on the miss side of the meal.

data.title: Got the fajita plate
data.text: I believe I went on a Thursday when they are having a special. Check out each day because they have a special everyday (I believe). The fajitas were good; so were their margaritas. Go and visit

data.title: Nice Place , Good Food
data.text: Kelly's is a nice place to go and enjoy a non-hectic meal. They have the new side that allows for wtaching games while leaving the old section for less noisy dining.

data.title: Their smoked meats are awesome!
data.text: Just driving up outside, you smell the smoked meats and know it's going to be good. Owner is frequently there, or at his location in Allen. Service is usually good as well. We eat there every few months and are never disappointed. And, you can bring your dog to sit on the patio with you.

data.title: Kelly's in Downtown is a for sure!
data.text: Kelly's Eastside another Plano favorite and the location downtown adds to the experience. Any item on the food menu should be a hit but experience says you can't go wrong with their chicken fried steak and burgers....Good cold beverages also!

data.title: Fun place!
data.text: Really good food, lots of great choices, high energy, personable wait staff, outdoor seating...all in the heart of Historic Downtown Plano! Great for families, groups of friends, teams. Watch your favorite sports teams (they are Texas A&M fans).

data.title: Nice Pub Style
data.text: Kelly's is casual and trendy with a good patio and fireplace (all season). Not a huge selection, but a good variety of menu items.  Great downtown Plano location!

data.title: delicious but pricey for lunch
data.text: The food is delicious, but a little pricey, I think  - particularly for their salad, which is what i tend to have for lunch.

data.title: Decent food
data.text: I have to say- I'm thankful Kelly's was open at such an late hour but I have nothing spectacular to say about the food. I had the fried chicken with their homemade queso. The queso does have a little kick to it, but it's not overly spicy. The chicken breast was not the most generous I've seen but you do get two sides with this. The mashed potatoes were bland but I enjoyed the grilled veggies.

data.title: Always Good
data.text:
Kelly's has good food and a nice spots-oriented atmosphere. The service has always been good and I have never had a bad meal here. The queso with brisket or pork is excellent as are the fajitas. But really, everything is very good. They smoke their own meats and are far better than Lockhart across the street. The restaurant and bar is always clean.

They attract a good following for college and pro football so get there early.They also have a nice patio where you can people watch which can be pretty entertaining on the weekend;)

data.title: Great Family Diner
data.text: I was in Plano for a family function and had diner here with family. The food was great and tasty. The server was freindly and helpfull. It a pretty good place to eat when in Plano.

data.title: Excellent
data.text: We have been long time patrons of Kelly's, although we are longhorn fans it was still worth the slap in the face to walk in to all the A&M memorabilia.  We were in there last week, and they have moved it all to the bar area so it is much more pleasant for all....(LOL)  Great hamburgers!!!!!!!!!
